code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE||'http://localhost:4000/api';export function setAuthToken(token){if(token)axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);else delete axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'];}export const authApi={register:payload=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/auth/register"),payload),login:payload=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/auth/login"),payload)};export const examApi={getPaper:()=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/exam/paper")).then(r=>r.data),submit:payload=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/exam/submit"),payload).then(r=>r.data),sendProctorEvent:payload=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/exam/proctor-event"),payload).then(r=>r.data)};
